item.title: Change content of a file in block or byte level
item.description: Since wrote Things learnt from recent preparation of 1T data for testing, I had figured out how to do that on the following weekends. Today I couldnâ€™t get the steps to do so immediately. It is better to note down for my next time usage. The detailed steps is as following Find the location in the file Get the block contains contents to modify Extract the block to a file and modify it
